news_header: Methanex reported a revenue of $949 million for Q4 2024, a 2.9% increase year-over-year, with an EPS of $1.24.
news_original_title: Compared to Estimates, Methanex (MEOH) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
news_text: For the quarter ending December 2024, Methanex (MEOH) achieved a revenue of $949 million, reflecting a 2.9% increase compared to the same quarter last year. The earnings per share (EPS) stood at $1.24, significantly higher than $0.52 from the previous year. However, the revenue fell short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.02 billion by 7.29%. The company exceeded EPS expectations with a surprise of 22.77%, compared to the consensus estimate of $1.01. Investors are advised to consider key financial metrics for a clearer understanding of the company's performance.
